entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
